name: ventilatorproject-frontend
description: This is the front-end for the VentilatorProject. It's written in HTML/CSS/JS and uses the [Material Design Web](https://material.io/develop/web) framework.

scripts.start: npm run build & npm run open
scripts.build: [ -d './build' ] && rm -dr ./build && npx babel ./js -d ./build & sass -s compressed ./css/sass:./build & cp ./css/normalize.css ./build/normalize.css

author: Squash-16933
